Summary: Funke Ernest-Omoruyi: Over 500 families changed their finances for choosing to share what I learned . Navigating life as a new immigrant or professional in today’s fast-paced digital world can be overwhelming .

Title: Euler-Ajayi calls for girl-child empowerment, inclusive leadership
Summary: Dr. Omolara Euler-Ajayi has called for the empowerment of a girl-child and inclusion of women in leadership . The educationist and gender advocate has been a prominent gender advocate in Nigeria .

Title: Rethinking Women’s Leadership in Nigeria: Women who shaped our past, present & future
Summary: Rethinking Women’s Leadership in Nigeria: Women who shaped our past, present & future . Nigerian women have never waited for permission to shape the world around them .

Title: Taming rising cases of suicide among young people
Summary: On December 7, a disheartening story  of suicide went viral . A 27-year-old student of the Nigerian Law School, Yola Campus, Adamawa State, committed suicide .

Title: How new thinking can rescue Nigeria from decline — Pat Utomi
Summary: Professor of Political Economy, Pat Utomi, gave reasons Nigeria has failed to reach its potential . He proffered solutions to the country’s problems . Utomi: I think the Tony Uranta Memorial lecture was an excellent lecture .

Title: 16 years after Christmas Day suicide bombing attemp, Nigerian official tells the story
Summary: On December 25, 2009, Umar Abdulmutallab, better known as the Christmas Bomber, attempted to detonate explosives hidden in his underwear . The bomb attempt was carried out 16 years ago .

Title: Activists on quelled Benin coup: Democracy only matters to African leaders when military threatens it, not when their actions are killing it
Summary: Activists on quelled Benin coup: Democracy only matters to African leaders when military threatens it, not when their actions are killing it . "African leaders are stooges to those foreign countries," activist says .

Title: NDA denies negligence in case of missing cadet
Summary: The Nigerian Defence Academy has issued a clarification following reports circulating online alleging that a cadet, Stephen Gani, went missing from the institution without adequate response from authorities . In a Friday statement released and signed by the Academy Public Relations Officer, Major Reuben Kovangiya, the school said the reports were misleading .

Title: NYSC adds AI, App development to revamped skill acquisition programme
Summary: The NYSC said its Director-General, Brigadier General Olakunle Nafiu, disclosed this in his address at the 2025 second SAED stakeholders’ summit held in Abuja on Friday . He said the scheme had embarked on a comprehensive digital transformation of the SAED programme as a pathway to combating youth unemployment .

Title: Democrats release new Epstein photos showing Trump, Clinton, others
Summary: Democratic lawmakers released a new cache of photos on Friday from the estate of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein that includes images of US President Donald Trump and former president Bill Clinton . Title: How I broke FUTA academic record with 4.98 CGPA – Varsity best graduate, Akindunbi
Summary: Aduragbemi Akindunbi is a 25-year-old Civil Engineering graduate of the Federal University of Technology, Akure, Ondo State . He graduated as the 2024 overall best graduate with a record-breaking CGPA of 4.98 .
